properties.headline: Winter Weather Advisory issued February 12 at 3:33AM CST until February 13 at 12:00AM CST by NWS Topeka KS
properties.description:
* WHAT...Snow expected. Total snow accumulations of 1 to 2 inches
with locally higher amounts up to 3 inches possible, mainly
during the morning. Snow should mix with rain during the
afternoon. Light snow will again be possible along an arctic
front this evening. Wind gusts of 35 mph will be possible late
this evening.

* WHERE...Morris, Wabaunsee and Shawnee Counties.

* WHEN...From 6 AM Wednesday to midnight CST Wednesday night.

* IMPACTS...Plan on slippery road conditions. The hazardous
conditions could impact both the morning and evening commute.
properties.instruction:
Slow down and use caution while traveling.

The latest road conditions for the state you are calling from can
be obtained by calling 5 1 1.

NWSheadline: WINTER WEATHER ADVISORY IN EFFECT UNTIL MIDNIGHT CST TONIGHT
